Localization.Name: Crusader Industries
Localization.Description: Makers of an extensive fleet of cargo, vehicle and data transport ships, and cutting edge shuttles, Crusader Industries is a titan of the aerospace industry. It is a company so powerful and prominent that it purchased a gas giant in the Stanton system to house its current headquarters.

English.Name: Crusader Industries
English.Description: Makers of an extensive fleet of cargo, vehicle and data transport ships, and cutting edge shuttles, Crusader Industries is a titan of the aerospace industry. It is a company so powerful and prominent that it purchased a gas giant in the Stanton system to house its current headquarters.

Localization.Name: Finley the Stormwal Large Plushie
Localization.Description: Finley the Stormwal loves sailing through the clouds in Crusader's atmosphere. Much like Crusader's ships, Finley is big, graceful, and quite the sight to behold. Now this majestic blue stormwal can accompany you on a journey through the stars with this large, soft, and squeezable plushie.
